 2008-17692008-11-20,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActBroadcasting Act
PrecisDecision of the Governor in Council TO REFER BACK to the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission for reconsideration and hearing the decisions, contained within Broadcasting Decision CRTC 2008-222, to approve the application for a broadcasting licence by Astral Media Radio inc. to operate an English-language commercial FM radio programming undertaking to serve Ottawa and Gatineau.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2008-0140 Publication Date: 2008-12-10
